name: Attraction (neobonde)
description:
Reunite a bind lover with his partner.

To play just click and heard the blind lover to his destiny

Unfortunately, this is just a small demo since I also have full-time work, but for me, the most important thing was to complete a project, so this is a success whatever happens.

Know bugs:

  • The camera view is slightly zoomed on the WebGL Version
  • On the menu Quitting in the WebGL version causes weird things to happen
